question.title: Majority Element
prompt: Given an array of integers, find the {{ element }} that appears more than {{ n/2 }} times.

explanations: In the given array, the element 3 appears more than ⌊3/2⌋ = 1 times.

constraints: You may assume that the array is non-empty and the majority element always exist in the array.
hints: Try to cancel out all elements except one.
